arts.sum: Cagliari come into this match hoping to gain their fourth successive head to head victory against Sassuolo. However Cagliari are not in the best of form having failed to win in their last four games ...

arts.ttl: Cagliari vs. Sassuolo - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Serie A clash between Cagliari and Sassuolo, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
